checker NYE 22

got to follow these goons around again for new years eve. started with a little practice session at Checker HQ and ended in a basement somewhere in detroit. unfortuantely the good times got the best of me and I stopped taking photos after the first part of the show.

all that to say. go see a checker show. you won't be disappointed

shot on canon 5D mkiii
